Reviews.Title: 22 inch keeps pace!
Reviews.Author: LadyHawke9973 "LadyHawke"
Reviews.Content: I have the 22 inch version of this model line (Samsung LN-22A330) for my bedroom, and am VERY impressed. The picture quality is fantastic, and it has settings where you can fine tune the settings for individual channels.I have it on every morning for the news while I'm getting ready for work, and every night as I wind down and fall asleep (very appreciative of the person who first installed sleep timers on TVs).I like everything about this unit, including the "tools" function on the remote for the most-used items in my house (including the sleep functions).  There are "fun" settings, too...where you can choose not only your energy savings level, but also what type of image you're watching...a "movie" versus reg tv....it deepens the color beautifully without actually changing the colors.The only item I find disconcerting is the sheer amount of time it takes to respond to turning the unit 'on'. Once you hit Power, just ignore it and ...................................................THEN you'll hear the tones turning it on (tones may be set at different volumes and even turned off if you poke around in the menu long enough to find it).Given time, I'll certainly get used to the amount of time it is, but for now it's bothersome as there is no other indicator that you actually hit the button correctly (the light on the power button on the tv doesn't flash at first, nothing).If I needed to replace this 22" unit for some reason, I'd buy the same model again in a heartbeat.  Very pleased with Samsung's 330 line.  Excellent value for the price for a bedroom tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Dave in Connecticut
Reviews.Content: I gave it 4 stars only because something has to be absolutely spectacular for me to give it 5 stars. Pretty much anything good that has been said about the set is true. I do have to take exception with the comments that it takes a long time to turn on. I took a stopwatch to it with the following results. From the time I pressed the power button it took 2.5 seconds for the "welcome tune" and about 9 seconds to deliver a picture. I expect that most people can live with that. I have two Sony Bravia sets that take about the same amount of time to start up. Overall, it's a very good set and a solid value.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the prior reviews
Reviews.Author: S. Menkhaus
Reviews.Content: I bought this product after reading the prior reviews. We bought this for a large bedroom and it is a great match for the room, great picture and excellent sound quality. This arrived two days after ordering via UPS even with the savings shipping. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased, and room for improvement
Reviews.Author: obama voter
Reviews.Content: This TV has exceeded expectations.  Having read many previous reviews criticizing the sound quality and/or volume, I was apprehensive but finally decided to try it out.  So glad I did!  It's only been hooked up for a few hours, but I'm thoroughly pleased (and I'm watching/listening from nearly 20' away!  And the volume isn't even 1/4 of capacity.  (As far as being 20' away, that's *not* my usual TV-watching distance, but right now I'm in the dining room and looking into the living room where the TV is positioned to face me, and I'm impressed.)  There are a couple of things I'd tweak on the remote, including adding backlighting, but really this is not a complaint.

Reviews.Title: great t.v
Reviews.Author: Daniel Zeitler "SomeRandomGuy"
Reviews.Content: t.v works great. lots of plug ins for audio and video, hmdi input and laptop input are a plus.pros-720p3,000-1 constrast/dynamic contrast ratiovivid color and sharpnessbuilt like a samsungcons-built in speakers kind of suck but come on get surround sound!kind of pricey for a 22 inch but after using it for this long i cant really complain.

Reviews.Title: SOUND QUALITY IS HURTING THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: North Carolina
Reviews.Content: I just purchased a Samsung LN22A330 22-inch LCD TV.  As other reviewers noted, the sound quality is poor, no, make that annoying!  If you raise the volume more than 30%, the low tones start to rattle and garble.  Not a good feature for Samsung.  I'm definitely disappointed with the poor sound quality; will probably have to attach speakers to it for decent sound projection.  Other than that, I am very pleased with the rest of the set.

Reviews.Title: DIFFERENCE between 450 and 330 22 in LCDTV samsung
Reviews.Author: J. Dolan "j"
Reviews.Content: Both rated the same (330 and 450) Not even sure where to ask this question.  I have been researching the 22 inch 720p 330 and 450 models of the samsung tv.  Both are the same price and both have great reviews.  The higher model (touch of color) is around the same price but the reviews are not nearly as good as both of the 330 and 450.  Does anyone know which is better for the money?  They both look great (pretty much the same) and both have the complaint of the sound but that is about it!  If anyone has researched both, let me know!

Reviews.Title: decent TV
Reviews.Author: Mei Ling
Reviews.Content: no complaints except that the volume on this TV can be a little too low.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Camper/TV Viewer!
Reviews.Author: Clipper "Al Smith"
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy to have a 22" Samsung LCD TV residing in my home. The overall appearance and, more importantly, the quality of picture/sound meet my high standards of expectation. My advice to someone considering purchasing this product: "Go for it!"

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: Walter B. Cartwright "Jazz 4 Musicians"
Reviews.Content: Chicago, 1-2-09Excellent picture quality. Very good sound. Easy to use and read instructions. Can get all the channels in your area.Great value for the price. I highly recommend this T.V. for any room in the house. If you do not have cable, direct tv, etc., purchase a high quality digital anntena.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Peter M. Peitsch
Reviews.Content: I have compared Samsung with other brands in the stores.  In side by side comparisons, Samsung picture quality is the best.  Durability has also been their hallmark.  We have owned nothing but Samsung televisions since the late 90s and have never been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: tempermental on switch
Reviews.Author: Anna Horn Kreske "natural healing"
Reviews.Content: After less than one year the only way I can turn on my Samsung is to unplug it from the monitor, let it reset, and hope that it powers up.  It is very tempermental and a real annoying problem.  Of course it is past the year warranty so I am stuck with this slug.  Never will buy a samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Good TV - Great Picture, Decent Sound
Reviews.Author: M. Golden
Reviews.Content: The picture is everything you would expect from a Samsung: crystal clear and beautiful. HDTV, Blu Ray, and PS3 games look brilliant, and the screen seems larger than 22 inches. That being said, the speakers could have used some more power behind them. They are a bit soft.

Reviews.Title: pleased
Reviews.Author: Frank Meddleson Jr.
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a LCD tv. I think that the plasma screen gives a better  picture because there is no distortion from any viewing area, but the LCD is a good picture if viewed straight on. If you sit too close though, it gets a little grainy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN22A330 22-Inch 720p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: John M. Wong
Reviews.Content: Very Good small sized HDTV. Has very sharp picture. Flesh tones however are not rendered well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung, 22"
Reviews.Author: Gregory J. Diebolt
Reviews.Content: I was interested in this item once I saw that it was backed by Amazon.com. I did extensive research on this item, both in the retail stores and on the web (ebay). The price was a factor and I put great faith in the description provided by the seller. Once my decision was made to go thru Amazon, everything went smooth for a good transaction. Thanks Amazon.com !!

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. for the price.
Reviews.Author: T. Miracle "collector"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone.Great value for the money.Just big enough to put into a bedroom T.V.cabinet.The sound is good.The picture quality is great. There are quite a few options to personalize settings of your preference.A must have.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: Deb in PA "newbie"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful telelvison...and it was available at a wonderful price.  I received it quickly. Purchasing this product from Amazon has made this site one I check for any further shopping needs.

Reviews.Title: Happy DAD
Reviews.Author: R. Hawkins "Outstanding!"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung LN22A330-22inch 720 LCD HDTV, for a Christmas gift for my son,from Amazon.com,Outstanding timely deliver,all I can say is he Loves it "picture is great DAD"

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG LN22A330/22" HDTV
Reviews.Author: K. T. SUMMERS
Reviews.Content: THIS TV IS GREAT FOR THE BEDROOM,GOOD PICTURE GOOD SOUND AND MOST IMPORTANTA GOOD PRICE.

Reviews.Title: Don't make a purchase with BIG OUTLET
Reviews.Author: M. Vierra
Reviews.Content: I had a problem and had to return my purchase it cost me $80.00 dollars to return and there restocking fee.They overcharge and are very hard to deal with .DON'T MAKE A PURCHASE WITH BIG OUTLET YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED

ProductInfo.Features:
8ms Response time
3,000:1 Contrast Ratio
1 HDMI Input, 1 Component Input
3W Audio Output
Headphone Jack
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung LN22A330 22-Inch 720p LCD HDTV
